about_the_game:
A light novel game with full animation and full voice!

You will enjoy the story that unfolds with dynamic animation, just like a short film.

Story Outline

Tokyo Girls Chronicle” is a story about two girls who meet and develop a friendship in Tokyo.

In the cold rain of Tokyo, an android girl named Lynn is alone in a park. Lynn, who has no feelings or memories, longs to connect with someone.

Aoi, a dark-haired girl, appears and gently calls out to Lynn, inviting her to come under her umbrella. Gradually, the two become friends, and Aoi accepts that Lynn is an android and understands her loneliness. Eventually, as the rain stopped and a rainbow appeared, Lynn felt emotions for the first time and felt that her encounter with Aoi was the beginning of a new life.

Through her encounter with Aoi, Lynn gradually regains her humanity through friendship.

However, the story reaches a major turning point when Lynn discovers the secret of her own birth.

What inspired me to create this game?

Until now, I have not been very interested in light novel games.

The reason was that I was not attracted to the picture-story-like format, with text and still pictures as the main elements.

So what would happen if I were to create a light novel game?

If it were fully animated, I might be interested. And I thought it would be interesting if I could make it myself.

I wanted the story to be a simple one about the bond between two girls, and I chose Tokyo as the setting because I used to live in Tokyo and had a longing for that city.

[Exploratory Elements

In the middle of the story, Aoi can also enjoy an exploration game to find Rin.

Aoi can find Lynn by relying on the hints in the video, and advance the story.

How to start the game

First, press the opening button to enjoy the opening movie.

After watching the movie, press the button to return to the title screen.

The button for the next chapter will appear, and you can continue the story from there.

Information about the distribution of the game

Distribution of this game is permitted up to “Emily's Story”.

Distribution of the story after that will be prohibited to prevent spoilers.
